definition: strong/powerful/better/slightly more than/vigorous/violent/best in their category, e.g. see 百強|百强[bai3 qiang2]
to force/to compel/to strive/to make an effort

sentences.english: Glue- sniffing among Singapore's youth is making a worrying comeback after many years in decline.
sentences.chinese: 沉寂多年的青少年嗅吸強力膠現象死灰復燃。

sentences.english: Police found a gun and duct tape at the second-year medical student's Quincy, Mass., home.
sentences.chinese: 警察在其昆西的家中發現了一把手槍和強力膠帶。

sentences.english: I'm the social glue that holds this little group together.
sentences.chinese: 我可是將這個小團體黏在一起的強力膠。

sentences.english: I superglued the switch and the soldered the contacts.
sentences.chinese: 我用強力膠水粘上了開關，並焊接好了觸點。

sentences.english: New kind of source of environment-friendly glue set as hard as rock and can be washed.
sentences.chinese: 新型環保強力膠水，使粘合部位更牢固，不怕水洗。

sentences.english: Super glue makes many things stick together.
sentences.chinese: 強力膠可以將很多東西粘合到一起。

sentences.english: Wash the area with soap and water once the glue is gone.
sentences.chinese: 當強力膠被清除後，再次用肥皂水清洗被粘部位。

sentences.english: Superglue was discovered by Harry Coover during WWII.
sentences.chinese: 哈利庫弗在二戰的時候發明了強力膠。

sentences.english: My clothes used to stick together like Velcro.
sentences.chinese: 我的衣服以前都像強力膠似地黏在一塊。

sentences.english: The only thing that would do a better job of keeping these earbuds in place would be Super Glue.
sentences.chinese: 唯一能使耳塞好好的保持原位的恐怕就是強力膠了。

sentences.english: For Lord's sake you aren't supposed to use super glue on instruments. That will only spoil it.
sentences.chinese: 你不能用強力膠，這隻會加劇樂器的損壞程度。

sentences.english: Glue the mirror in with a strong adhesive.
sentences.chinese: 用強力膠將鏡子固定到位。

sentences.english: Use strong tape if a strapping machine is not available.
sentences.chinese: 如果沒有封箱機，要使用強力膠帶。

sentences.english: During the Vietnam War, super glue was used to seal minor wounds.
sentences.chinese: 越南戰爭期間，強力膠曾被用來黏住細小傷口。
